originalTitle: US YouTube star IShowSpeed to get Ghanaian passport as Africa tour ends
title: US YouTube star IShowSpeed to get Ghanaian passport as Africa tour ends
content: Ghana's foreign minister says the influencer is a "worthy ambassador", but some Ghanaians criticised the move.

originalTitle: The model who moved to Ghana and wrapped her prosthetic leg in its famous fabric
title: The model who moved to Ghana and wrapped her prosthetic leg in its famous fabric
content: Abena Christine Jon'el left the US and now aims to raise the profile of people with disabilities in Ghana.

originalTitle: Ex-Nigeria oil minister in bribery trial spent £2m at Harrods, court hears
title: Ex-Nigeria oil minister in bribery trial spent £2m at Harrods, court hears
content: Diezani Alison-Madueke is accused of accepting bribes from industry figures interested in Nigerian government contracts, a court in London has heard.

originalTitle: Trump says US ready to attack Iran with ‘speed and violence’
title: Trump says US ready to attack Iran with ‘speed and violence’
content: Fears of a US attack on Iran are again heightened after Donald Trump threatened action “like with Venezuela.”

originalTitle: Rubio testifies before US Senate on abduction of Venezuela’s Maduro
title: Rubio testifies before US Senate on abduction of Venezuela’s Maduro
content: Top US diplomat gives scant mention of international law as he touts 'strategic' significance of abducting Maduro.

originalTitle: LIVE: Benfica vs Real Madrid – UEFA Champions League
title: LIVE: Benfica vs Real Madrid – UEFA Champions League
content: Follow our live updates, with team news coverage, ahead of our text commentary stream of the UCL league-phase finale.

originalTitle: Trump warns Iran 'time is running out' for nuclear deal as US military builds up in Gulf
title: Trump warns Iran 'time is running out' for nuclear deal as US military builds up in Gulf
content: Tehran says it will “respond like never before” if necessary to what the US president says is a "massive Armada" moving towards Iran.

originalTitle: China trip will bring benefits to UK, Starmer insists, ahead of Xi meeting
title: China trip will bring benefits to UK, Starmer insists, ahead of Xi meeting
content: The prime minister seeks to strengthen ties with China but faces fierce criticism from opponents at home.

originalTitle: Panic on crowded train - passenger tells BBC of moment of Russian drone strike
title: Panic on crowded train - passenger tells BBC of moment of Russian drone strike
content: Five people died in the attack in northeastern Ukraine when three drones targeted the train.

originalTitle: Sterling leaves Chelsea by mutual consent
title: Sterling leaves Chelsea by mutual consent
content: Raheem Sterling leaves Chelsea by mutual consent after reaching an agreement on his departure.

content: With the league phase of the Champions League almost over, which teams can join Arsenal and Bayern Munich in the top eight?

title: Fulham agree to sign Man City winger Bobb for £27m
content: Fulham agree a £27million deal with Manchester City to sign Oscar Bobb.
